title: The World - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Romance   School Life   Shounen
tags: Academy   Fantasy World   Magic   Male Protagonist

description:
'All past history has been erased.'

All details except for his name and age are unknown.

The person who passed the entrance exam of the Magic Academy at the top of his class, Amagi Souma.

He wants power more than anyone else, but where will he end up...?>
